alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Barnwell; Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 6:30PM EDT until April 05 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Barnwell County in central South Carolina... Bamberg County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 630 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Barnwell, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Barnwell, Bamberg, Denmark, Blackville, Barnwell State Park, Rivers Bridge State Park, Ehrhardt, Hilda, Olar, Kline, Govan, Bamberg County Airport and Barnwell County Airport. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central South Carolina. For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central South Carolina.
